thread.title: Markos Tegui and Anything But Monday Release Second Single "Just Do It (Remix)"
thread.title_full: Markos Tegui and Anything But Monday Release Second Single "Just Do It (Remix)" - PR.com

author: PR.com
title: Markos Tegui and Anything But Monday Release Second Single "Just Do It (Remix)"
text:
Markos Tegui and Anything But Monday Release Second Single "Just Do It (Remix)"
Tegui celebrates a sound dedicated to the future, and timelessness of hip hop music.
San Diego, CA, September 09, 2015 --( PR.com )-- Big Noise artist Markos Tegui and Anything But Monday are proud to announce the release of their undeniable, dynamic new single 'Just Do It (Remix).'
Like all of the songs that he creates, and the previous track with ABM, 'Sweat,' the new track captures Markos Tegui's unique style and devotion to passionate music and experiences in a way that makes his sound truly one-of-a-kind. The hard-driving rhythm of 'Just Do It (Remix)' is impossible to ignore and the transitions and switch-ups used throughout the song help to give the music a depth that's difficult to imitate - with twists and turns that set the bar higher on the pop-rap music scene and leaves the listener on the edge of their seat.
Says Tegui, "This song will light a fuse up at any party, at any event!"
'Just Do It (Remix)' blends a stunning contrast between the gorgeous sound of female voices and amazing hip hop lyrics into a fantastic full-circle sound. Combined with a cool beat and amazing flow, this is a single that's sure to get hearts beating faster and feet moving. Tegui's plan is to light up the club scene and have the radio stations clamoring to put this song on over and over again. "Perfect for people with a sense of party-power in their blood, DJs, and lovers of music that moves, this song sets the tone for a future that lies in the strength of EDM and hip-hop," says Tegui.
The new single, is an exclusive sneak peak at his next full-length release, "R.A.P (Royal Arch Poet)," the new album that will be hitting the shelves in late 2015.
'Just Do It (Remix)' is on sale now at
https://www.billboardmusicstore.com/artist/1860728
Official Website and Full Bio:
http://www.bignoisenow.com/markostegui.html
